oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Agricultural economics; Agricultural land lease; Anti-Palestinian economic measures; Ashkenazi Jews; Children's games; Demolition; Dwellings; Education; Family structure; Farming practices; Fathers; House rent; Land sale; Languages; Mothers; Orphans; Palestinian Jews; Palestinian-Jewish relations; Peasant workers; Religious practices; Taxes; Work; ʻArab al-Zubayd (Palestine); Agricultural land lease; al-Zubayd (Arab tribe); Arab Revolt, 1936-1939; Arbitration; Boycott; British colonialism; Clothing and dresses; Executions; Jewish immigrants; Machination; Military superiority; Social norms; Treason; Village siege; Work; Arab countries; Boycott; Demolition; Expulsion from Palestine; Guards; Military superiority; Murder; Newspapers; Nostalgia; Psychological warfare; Resistance; Return; Seeking refuge; Skirmishes; Terrorism; Weapon acquisition; Zionist Invasion of Palestine, 1948; Zionist occupation
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on June 16, 2004 with Muṣṭafá Mūsá al-Khaṭīb, male, born in ʻArab al-Zubayd, Palestine and resides in al-Burghulīyah Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع مصطفى موسى الخطيب في 16 حزيران يونيو، ذكر، ولد عام 1925 في عرب الزبيد، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم البرغلية للاجئين الفلسطنيين، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Political turmoil and cutting off Palestinian-Jewish relations. (@ 18:56)
